title: Support browser_url_overrides to allow customized net tab page, etc. (since users can't set their own choice of new tab page...)
body: Edge currently offers very few options for controlling the new tab experience, and the ones it does have are... not popular, judging by the Windows Insider feedback. Allowing extensions to override things like New Tab page would simultaneously address this concern and allow more Chrome extensions to be ported, making Edge a much nicer browser to use.
